dmca.title: Is this Brother John?
dmca.body:
Dear Brother John:

 

You have posted defamatory and incorrect information about me on your blog,
Teacup Tempestry, and can be held as liable as those who sent you the
original link. I respectfully request you take down the Internet posting
from Wednesday, February 28th, regarding the Minuteman Project.  Not only is
the information posted factually incorrect and cause for a lawsuit, but you
incorrectly state I was the Treasurer of The Minuteman Project and that
could be the reason I wanted to take it over. No, by law I needed to be a
responsible Bard Member and release those who thwarted our investigation
into the finances.  Go to www.MinutemenForTruth.com
<http://www.minutemenfortruth.com/> , and it will take you to a MySpace page
that has 4 audio only recordings that clearly prove we are a Board, and that
Marvin and I tried to get to the bottom of the finances, but Gilchrist,
Eichler, and Bueler tried to thwart us from doing so, for over 60 days.

 

For your information, the wife of Jim Gilchrist conducted the book keeping
and accounting for the Minuteman Project, which raises questions in and of
itself, and Stephen Eichler was listed as the Treasurer of MMP when we
terminated Eichler and Gilchrist for fraud and malfeasance.

 

There in, that you write I was the Treasurer is the least amount of
defamation and libel you reposted without checking the story to be true,
even though you trust the source.

 

Plus, I am a rape victim who is in hiding from the friends and family of the
three strike serial rapist that I put away for 135 to life, and Jim
Gilchrist acted without a sense of decency, as did linda Muller, when they
released my real name with my pseudonym in an attempt to silence me and
extort me into silence in my charges against the fraud and corruption within
the MMP, as I had successfully hidden my real identity for 6 years.

 

They have placed my life in danger, and both will have to answer to placing
me in danger by willingly and knowingly releasing my identity on the
internet.  That is shameless, and lacks any decency whatsoever.

 

If you would like to discuss this in full, please do not hesitate to call me
at 714.508.5789.

 

I am copying my attorney on this email, as well.

 

Deborah Courtney
